category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
As I step into this week,
I'm handing everything over to Your care—my soul, my body, my plans, my friends.
Watch over me, protect me, guide me, direct me, make me holy, and bless me.

Turn my heart toward Your ways.
Shape me completely into the image of Jesus, like a potter shaping clay.
May the words I speak be like music that praises You.

Let the people around me see me living by Your Spirit—
not giving in to the world's values,
not conforming to its empty promises,
but transformed by a renewed mind,
wearing the full armor of God,
shining like a light that never goes out,
and showing holiness in everything I do.

Don't let any evil stain my thoughts, words, or actions this week.
Help me walk through messy situations and keep my life pure.

Even in the middle of everyday stuff, let my heart be set on heaven,
my love for You be passionate,
my focus fixed on what's unseen,
and my eyes open to how empty, fragile, and fake the things of this world are.

Help me to see everything from an eternal perspective,
living like I'm always waiting for my Lord to return,
listening for that final call,
and getting ready for the new heaven and new earth.

Guide all of my conversations this week with Your wisdom,
so they help everyone involved.
Don't let me be useless; help me to grow and to help others grow.
Help me to speak every word as if it were my last,
and take every step as if it were my final one.

If my life should end this week, let this be my best week.
